article_title: Unhealthy, Not Wealthy, And Far From Wise

article_metadata.description: Below is the October 12th Thoughts from the Frontline, republished in full.   “The first wealth is health.” – Ralph Waldo Emerson “Man needs difficulties. They are necessary for health.” – Carl Jung Decisions, decisions. Many Americans will have to make a big one in the next 60 days or so. How you decide will affect both [...]
article_metadata.author: John Mauldin
